channel.title: Eclips3 v2 - by skeptical - 7 quest's new pk places- umm good starter?
channel.description:
Not Much But Good Enough Features:7 Quest's, Donator item's, Quest Req's For items Based of Pk Planet [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/Aroguesqueststart.png[/img] [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/cleitnandaroguesquestfinisher.png[/img] [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/dragonpl8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/new_home.png[/img] [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/newquests.png[/img] [IMG]http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc215/thcbsman/workingprayerwithcustomhead.png[/img] There's More image's inside the actual server and client umm Changed some of the bonuses. some were 2 extreme changed some npc's in shops dint feel like changing the shops location good pking no glitches Quest's are 100% working =) the last quest's are kinda challeging
Credit's: Dont really give a fuck about them so it goes to who ever but thnks xpecially to spyman
ohhh n btw Devil Wears Prada-King of the ozone layer ftw? umm i dont think its that good i know i can code better then this but i guees im gonna make a new one -.-
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?rjuioznymzz]http://www.mediafire.com/?rjuioznymzz[/url]

item.title: Eclips3 v2 - by skeptical - 7 quest's new pk places- umm good starter?
item.dc:creator: @R_u_skeptical R_u_skeptical
item.description:
@R_u_skeptical wrote:

well i made the actual quest’s myself pkplanet didnt have any made on it so i dicide to make some of it based on oblivion-elderscroll quest’s like the rogue’s guild that quest enable’s you to use dart’s and knife’s also use rogue armor which has a good bonus 15+ everything all quest are work and i especially liked making the a fighter’s legend due to the fact that i made it let you were the custom d pl8 by spyman after it completed this the special thing is that this is like my first source, i will release better once later on. =)
Also you need to complete the lunar quest’s to do get lunar magic this quest was on pkplanet but … it did not work correctly since you couldnt get the item’s and the npc would talk…

Read full topic
